sentences.sContent: Halsey was identified as a leading proponent of the values of progressive education.
sentences.sCn: 哈尔西被认为是进步教育价值观的首要支持者。

synos.tran: 支持者；建议者；提出认证遗嘱者

remMethod.val: pro (向前) + pon (放) + ent (人) → 把建议放在领导面前的人 → 建议者

trans.tranOther: someone who supports something or persuades people to do something
